title: Question:
author: ATUK22
content: Hi I am very intrigued about trading new listed coins, but I have noticed a large percentage of these coins rug pull after 30min, just a thought is it best just to trade new listed coins that have Liquidity over 50k for 15mins ?Can you swap/sell these coins after 15min? Thank youAndrew

comments.author: Tytanowy Janusz
comments.body: Quote from: ATUK22 on November 09, 2022, 07:53:58 AMHi I am very intrigued about trading new listed coins, but I have noticed a large percentage of these coins rug pull after 30min, just a thought is it best just to trade new listed coins that have Liquidity over 50k for 15mins ?Can you swap/sell these coins after 15min? Thank youAndrewWhat?! Are you asking us if its a good idea to gamble your money on an asset that is going to go to 0 in a matter of 0-10 min? They do rug-pull just after someone invests in their crap so its likely that they will rugpull just after you buy.Its way better to simply go to online roulette crypto casino and bet all your money on red or 00. At least you want sponsor scammers with your money.
